choices: The fellowship of the ring ( Frodo)
11.content:
As with most days spent at her computer , Lynn was going about her typical 9 to 5 day . She worked as an accountant of a Law firm in California, and made a descent money for the work she did .

" Ring Ring" The phone rang .

" Good Afternoon thank you for calling ---" Lynn started her typical Phone etiquette . When her Daughter cut her off .
" Mom the 20 dollars didn't get into my google account" Susan Lynn's teenage daughter said almost in a frantic . " Calm down let me check it out " Lynn said as she pulled up there joint account on her work computer . She worked in a two person office space and the other lady was across the room . Lynn who was in her mid 40's was very attractive and had dark brown hair , she could wear anything she would like to work . Normally she was a T-shirt and Jeans kind of lady . She wore glasses for distance and up close reading and as the computer screen reflected in her glasses Susan became impatient . " Mom I need the Money in the google account , otherwise I can't download it . "

" Just hand tight it should be there ......Now ....Its there now . " Lynn said back to Susan , who was on a phone at her school and checking her cell phone . " It is there ----" Susan hung up with Lynn . Lynn sat there for only a moment ' wow that was pleasant ' Lynn thought as a icon appeared on her desktop . Lynn being curious minimized the screens she had up and looked at the new Icon . The Icon on the screen was that of an I in a giant Circle that looked like a map Legend . "Is that what all the fuse was about ? Your playing an online game ?" Lynn thought as she noticed Susan and her joint account was linked to the Icon . Lynn scrolled the mouse over the Icon and read the description " For an adventure you will never forget , all it takes is a click ." Lynn raised an eyebrow , and then remembered that her other daughter was talking about a new app that was sweeping the nation .

" Hey have you heard of that new thing that is an app where you -----" Lynn asked the other lady in her office . " Oh yeah my husband and I used it last night . Its amazing , any story you want and Boom right there and its so real" . She said from behind her computer to Lynn , as Lynn couldn't help but think about a good story she knew . " Ah I know " As she clicked the Icon to try it out , the screen went black . 'Oh Crap I just crashed my work computer' Lynn thought at first . It was lucky that the other lady in her office kept to herself because if she could see Lynn and what was happening she would of been concerned . As Lynn Clicked her mouse with no luck , she then pressed a few buttons nothing happened . Then a huge flash as the Eye of The Dark Lord Sauron filled her screen , Lynn could feel the heat of the pulsating flames coming from the eye . " The one who will rule them all " A voice echoed through the speakers at Lynn , as she sat there the eye grew larger and pulled her in through her monitor .

" Ahhhhhhhhhhh" Lynn screamed as she fell through an abyss of darkness the flames from the eyes dissipated. Her fall was slowed down by hitting a few tree branches covered in Leafs . Then she continued to fall further and further down a huge hole until the light was completely gone . She fell through a few more sticks fashioned together to form a roof . Lynn laid there on the ground unconscious, for what seemed to be hours . As she regained her consciousness she could hear voices , most of it sounded like gibberish. Her head still spinning from the fall , her vision was blurry as she looked up to see the way she came down . she adjusted her glasses and looked over to see .........
11.title: The world of Middle Earth

111.content:
Lynn had taken some falls before , and in her youth she had two sisters and a brother . Taking her fair share of hits and falls was part of growing up . But the fall she just took knocked her senseless for a few moments , realizing she landed on her back Lynn started to lift her right arm and then realized she had a soreness in her wrist . As she continued to see things along the wall she could hear the voices off to the side of her were getting louder . Lynn felt a tug on her Flip flops and quickly looked down to see two small Goblins trying to eat her flip flop . " Ahhh " She screamed as she quickly jerked her foot up , in the same motion Lynn flung herself up and could now see the source of the voices . " Oh .....my" Lynn said as she adjusted her glasses to see not one or two , but thousands of Goblins in front of her . Once again the two smaller Goblins tried to eat Lynn's flip flop off her foot .

" Hey cut it out !!!" She shouted at the goblins and swatted them away, as she did that a huge mob of goblins rushed her . Lynn could feel hands clawing at her arms her legs . Her Flip flops were torn from her feet , and she was positioned in the crowd of the goblins to stand straight up .

" Lets eat it NOW!!! " One goblin snarrled out . " I want to eat the little toes one by one !" Another one said . All the voices in the crowd of Goblins where that of either eating or ripping stuff off of Lynn, her mouth covered by 4 sets of goblins hands . " No " One voice said over the others As Lynn could see there was a goblin just outside of the pack standing there watching all the others . " Only the goblin King can make the ruling on what to do with this one " The goblin said pointing at Lynn , and with that all the goblins began to move quickly down the narrow paths carrying Lynn with them . As they approached the huge cavern Lynn could hear a loud voice coming from an even bigger Goblin , but he wasn't talking about Lynn . He was actually having a conversation with a group of smaller people .

'Who the heck are they ? Why are they so short ?' Lynn thought as the goblins carrying her started to make there way up the stairs , a huge blue light over came all of them . Lynn was knocked free from the main group and 4 other Goblins fell with her . ' Not again ' Lynn thought as she fell even further down the Goblin Hole . She made sure her feet were under her this time , but looking at her bare feet she realized she had not time to re position herself . She was going bare feet first into.......
111.title: The Goblins are fascinated by there new arrival

1112.content:
As Lynn Continued to fall she wasn't an idiot who would randomly fall and hurt herself , she saw one of the goblins and aimed for it as they fell into another cavern . As the Goblins fell into the water Lynn Managed to aim her goblin and land in the water on top of it , it would of killed the goblin had it been a landing on hard rock . But under water Lynn could see the goblins swimming away from a shore that was light up by the moon light . Lynn surfaced and could see more goblins falling along the shore , that was light up by the moon . Lynn swam along and hide behind some rocks .

Lynn was socking wet now , she took this moment to put her hair in a pony tail and ring out her white shirt she was wearing . " Ah" She let out a quick little voice as to realize the ground in front of her was sharp . ' I have to walk carefully this place looks like broken glass ever where' , Lynn could hear a voice in the distance . It sounded like someone was singing a song . Lynn was ever so careful to not make noise as she could see a small grey person dragging along a goblin , it was singing a song which would of been nice except every few verses it would turn and wack the goblin on the head with a rock .

Lynn could see the silhouette of the creature and realize it wasn't quite human , but not a full animal . ' I wonder if that thing is another goblin' she thought as she kept low to the rocks and crawled along , trying not to get cut by the sharp edges . As Lynn tucked herself down a crack between the rocks she made her way down to a lower path that would just go under the odd creature and the goblin it was beating .

CRUNCH!!!!!

Hearing the sound of a something being crunched like that , Lynn could hear it as someone eating a huge drum stick or eating a big piece of meat. Just as Lynn tucked up against the rock the remains of the goblin were thrown down to the level she was on . Lynn covered her mouth quickly to not alert the thing above that had just decimated the golbin in front of her . Lynn knew it wasn't done with the goblin and it would most likely come to finish off its meal . Lynn grabbed some of the bones around her and tried to see if any of them were sharp or if they could be a weapon . As she looked she was mind full enough to keep the noise down , as she could hear the breathing of the creature above her .

But with a glimpse of it she could see a shiny item covered in dirty and rubbish . She looked closely at it as she freed it from the earth around it .
1112.title: Gollum's cave

11122.content:
Lynn was holding something in her hand but couldn't make it out , she kept shifting through her palm and realized what ever it was , it had vanished . Just as it had vanished the creature from above made its way down from the top rocks .

" What is it precious ? " The creature said as it coughed out " Gollum .....Gollum ..."

Lynn stood up and closed her eyes , she thought of being any where but there in the dark cavern . She thought if only she was invisible , then the creature wouldn't see her . Lynn paused of a few moments and then opened one of her eyes , she looked over at the creature Gollum and realized it wasn't attacking . Lynn looked at the creature with the huge round blue eyes , and 9 teeth . It was looking at Lynn , but it looked so sad .

" What is it precious , where is the precious ? " He said very concerned .

Lynn waved her hand not to close to the creature and realized it couldn't see her , ' I wonder if it can hear me?' Lynn thought to herself . Just then Gollum looked with his eyes slightly closed , almost angry . " We hear the precious, and the precious wonders ?" , Gollum said as he looked around still . ' He can hear what I am thinking ?'

Gollum who was looking off in the distance looked back at Lynn's location , and studied the rocks and area around her . " The precious is acting funny . "

' Are you going to eat me ?' Lynn thought to herself trying to hide any thoughts in her head .

" Eat you ? Why would we eat the precious ? " A much more playful almost child like version of Gollum Answered . Lynn smiled and as she smiled she was put to easy . As she let out a sigh of relief she didn't realize it but she appeared to Gollum .

" Huh.....Who is this Precious ? " Gollum said bewildered by the sudden sight of a woman in his cave . "Its......the precious ....." Gollum said once again with his eyes slightly closed and looking sinister .

" Wait you can see me ?" Lynn asked , to which she just blurted it out with out even thinking about the creature in front of her . " Yes ....yes we see the precious" Gollum said once again in his evil voice and look . He started to approach Lynn , " Now wait ........whats your name ? " Lynn asked with her hands reached out to halt the creature .

" Precious wants our name ? Our name Precious wants our name ? " The happy go lucky Creature answered . The coughed out " Gollum Gollum " . " Your name is Gollum ? " Lynn asked as Gollum brought his head up slowly and looked at his Precious . " Why does precious ask ? Precious knows " Lynn re-positioned herself and her foot got a corner of a sharp rock " Aghhhh" She let out . Gollum dropped his evil look and looked concerned . " Whats Wrong Precious ?"

" I need to get out of this cave , the goblins took my flops . " Lynn said as she rubbed her foot , she placed her foot back on the ground and pulled up her pants by her belt . She dusted herself off as Gollum looked on . " Do you know a way out of here ?" Lynn asked Gollum....
11122.title: The one ring to rule them all

111222.content:
Lynn adjusted her glasses again as Gollum looked very excited to know something the " Precious" had asked . Lynn smiled at Gollum who smiled back and said " we show you the way ....Gollum Gollum" he coughed . As he brought his head up again he was grinning sinisterly at Lynn again .

" The precious wants to leave us ....Why ? " Gollum asked again as he started to walk on all fours towards Lynn . Lynn Shifted her weight from her left to her right leg and said " because ......because we need to leave this place .....its dark and cold and it cuts .....the ....Precious?" as she jester-ed to her feet . Gollum looked down at Lynn's feet and saw they were cut , " Oh yes we take the precious , we take the precious now " Before she could say anything Gollum Grabbed Lynn's hand and flung her on his back . " Hang on Precious we go now . " He said as he began to jump from rock to rock . Lynn was amazed at how strong he was , but also scared how quick he was able to move .

As they neared a tunnel that lead into a darker cavern , Gollum put Lynn down . " The precious is going this way " He said pointing to the tunnel . As Lynn started to walk down the tunnel Gollum reached up and grabbed her arm .

" The precious is ours !!" He said as the evil version of him smiled at Lynn , Lynn flicked her wrist down and freed her arm . She thought about hitting the creature and had a thought of rage as she did this her left arm balled up and she punched Gollum in the head . Fire erupted from her fist as she made contact with him knocking him to the ground . She followed it up with a knee thrust into Gollum's chest .

" Why ? Why is the precious so made at us ? " Gollum asked cowering and covering his head up . " I don't know what's wrong with you but if you ever come after me again I 'll kill you!!!" Lynn said in a rage ....'Kill you ?' Did I just say that ?

" Yes !!! The precious did just say that !! The precious is the precious " The evil Gollum said looking from between Gollum's fingers .

"Don't follow me , and don't try to attack me" Lynn said as she ran out the tunnel . Gollum laid there and then looked up at the roof , he smiled
" The precious will be reunited with us soon enough ....."
111222.title: Gollum Knows a way out

choices: Lynn wants to do something else .
1112222.content:
Lynn Continued on Foot not realizing that she was in fact running down a hill side that recently had leafs fall over the rocks that where under her feet . For the first time in a few hours Lynn wasn't being pocked of probed , which gave her great speed to move quickly away from the Mountain she just escaped from . Lynn paused to catch her breath as she was starting to feel it in her chest .

' I haven't run like this in years ' she thought as she braced herself against a near by tree . She took a moment to look back and realize it wasn't just a small hill she fell into but a mountain . She had entered the Eastern Side of the Misty Mountains and had just passed the other side of it .

" Now that is a Mountain ." Lynn said , if she was near her house she would be thrilled to see such a sight but she wasn't anywhere near home or for that matter anywhere she recognized . Lynn then thought her phone's GPS should tell her where she is , and she pulled it out she realized it had to of been a few hours . Is Susan alright ? What happened at work ? Have they noticed I am gone ? Lynn thought about all of this as she pressed the button on her phone to turn it on .

" Wow for getting smashed against me , dropped into a lake and all the other stuff I am surprised it still works" Lynn said to herself surprised that her phone turned on perfectly . As she went through her home page , she located her app that had Maps on it . As she started the app , it showed her an odd map that she has never seen before .

'Middle Earth ?' Lynn thought as it zoomed in and showed that she was near the river Anduin and that there was an Elvish road near by . A road would feel a lot better on my feet probably and this way I wouldn't have to fight off Goblins . Lynn thought as she caught her breathe and continued towards the Road . She didn't realize it but something was compelling her to go East , East through Mirkwood and towards the Lonely Mountain and south of the Mountain .

Carefully Climbing down the side of the hill top she could see the river and the start of the trail she needed to get on, as she continued a Ork pack came up behind her on the Rock shards above her location . She sensed them before they showed themselves, and ducked down to not be seen by them . 'I know I will use that trick I did with Gollum' She thought as she focused on being invisible the pack had started to come down the hill side . As Lynn looked on she could see the pack not only didn't see her but didn't care to either , they were after a group of small people . Dwarfs if you will , as Lynn sat up she noticed a Grey Wizard with them and with out even knowing it Lynn came to her feet and reached out her hands . As the Orks and Dwarfs began to fight and battle , Lynn saw one of them singled out by the White Ork and fall . Lynn ran over to the fight , not sure what she was going to do but something compelled her to help . As the White Ork was about to let the wolf he was riding eat the dwarf Lynn Reached out and Just like when she battled Gollum a force came from her right arm in the form of wind . She blew the wolf away along with the white ork .

"How ? ......." Thorin oakenshield said as he passed out from the battle he had with the Ork's , Lynn rushed to his side and realized he couldn't see her still and for good reason . Lynn thought about flying away like an Eagle would and with out blinking and Eye Giant Eagles came and grabbed the company of Dwarfs and the Grey Wizard . As they soared through the air Lynn could see that the others still couldn't see her on top the Eagle carrying Thorin . As the Eagles dropped the Dwarfs off , Lynn slide down the back of the eagle and stood there for a moment .

' That was different she thought to herself ' as the company of the dwarfs greeted each other and said it was a miracle, Thorin looked towards Lynn and said " It was no miracle , something .....some force aided them . " Lynn stood silent and still not thinking of anything at all to avoid another Gollum incident . Thorin , Said it was a sign they were heading in the right direction and they company started down the trail they were on . Lynn let out a sigh of relief .

" Normally when one becomes a hero they rise and take a bow " A billowing voice said as a shadow over came her own . Lynn looked back to see Gandalf the grey the wizard was right behind her . " You can appear now they are gone .....My name is Gandalf" he said " Whats yours ?"
" Finally a person I can talk to " Lynn said as she dropped her cloak and threw her arms up in the air . " Well now, your not what I thought" Gandalf said surprised to see a mid 40 year old woman , who was still very attractive for her age standing there . " Oh ....Sorry my names Lynn" she said as she placed one hand on her chest and reached out to shack his hand . " I take it our a wizard from a far away land then?" Gandalf said returning the good jester . " Well I wouldn't call myself a wizard per-say ....." Lynn started to say then Gandalf expressed " Well you are able to disappear and save dwarfs when you need to ....that is a talent only a wizard would have in these parts." Gandalf continued still surprised to see a woman like Lynn standing there . We should go .....
1112222.title: Continue with Lynn

choices: They arrive at Rivendale with no attacks
11122221.content:
“ Where are we heading ?” Lynn asked as Gandalf lead her on foot down a path from the dwarfs.

“ We must go seek the guidance of the White Council , they will know how to assist us going forward” Gandalf said as the two came across two horses one a big black horse and the other a majestic White horse .
Gandalf aided Lynn in saddling up to the black horse , “ have you had much riding experience ?” He asked as He presented his hands interlocked for Lynn to step up on .

“ I have been riding horse since I was a young girl , but never any as big as this beauty. She must be 12 heads high?” Lynn asked as she settled on the small settle that the horse recently had placed on her back.

“ Why ….if you measured by heads then yes , but we normally measure by age and in this case she is 230 yrs old.” Gandalf mentioned as he walked over to his white stead and jumped on while still smoking his pipe.

Lynn smiled as she grabbed a hold of the rains that was a new way to look at it and since the horse was much older than any she had ever ridden she took it with grace and understanding. As time passed in this new strange land Lynn didn’t seem to notice that there was drastically strange things that were different from the world she knew . As they started down the trail Lynn remembered to check her phone’s GPS , which had then on a narrow trail heading for Rivendale west of the Mirkwood .

“ Are we not heading to the Lonely Mountain ?” Lynn asked as she looked up at the grey wizard which she was following .

“ We must first meeting with the White council , or the group of elves and wizards of Middle Earth to see what we can do to assist you in your travels” Gandalf’s words seemed to comfort Lynn , but his thoughts contradicted what he spoke .

‘She is extremely powerful , and I fear that if left to roam could cause more destructive then peaceful’.

Lynn didn’t know how to even express her opinion of what she just heard from Gandalf’s thoughts. Knowing from her time in Gollum’s cave Lynn emptied her mind of any thoughts just in case it was a two way deal . As they continued down the paths and over the mountains it was refreshing to see that not all creatures would attack them .

“ It must be good fortune to have to along” Gandalf remarked , as they cleared the Lonely Mountains .

“ Why do you say that ?” Lynn asked in a cheerful glee about herself . “The last few times I have come across this road either Orks or Goblins , birds or the Mountain itself have attacked me . ( Lynn raised her eyebrows in disbelief ) But now all of them are not even near us ."
11122221.title: Lynn Agrees

111222211.content:
As the horse entered into Rivendale , Lynn could see that above their heads moving very quickly through the trees looked to be people.

“ No doubt they will alert Master Elrond of our arrival” Gandalf huffed as they came to a stop and started to dismount from their horses .
Lynn stepped down and almost fell off her horse .

“ WHOA!!” Lynn let out , seeing as how the ground was much further down then she had thought . She was caught in the arms of an Elve woman who approached from behind.

“ I am Tauriel , if you need any further assistance I am her to serve” The Red haired Elf woman , expressed very sincerely as she bowed down to Lynn as she placed her feet first on the ground . Lynn dusted off her pants looking down for just a moment , she looked up at Tauriel as if she had just heard a whisper .

‘I am one of the best woodland Elves , I should not have to pander to anyone let alone a human .’ Tauriel looked puzzled at Lynn who once again just over heard a thought from a nearby person.

‘Oh screw you !!!’ Lynn thought , but quickly stopped thinking . Once again hoping it was not a shared ability.
But Tauriel looked back at Lynn and said “ Is there something a matter ? You are staring at me?”

“ No no forgive me , you look very ….beautiful , I have a son who would find you very attractive”. Lynn said covering her odd behavior , and thinking of her Son Tyler .

“ You honor me with your admiration , Please we must continue to the council chamber “ Tauriel , mentioned as a way to move past this rather odd meeting . As they walked along the halls more and more elves looked at Lynn who was embarrassed , not only was she not wearing shoes . but since she fell through the Goblin tunnels and on the trails her clothing has become not only dirty but tattered .

“ Is there a place I can freshen up ? I would hate to meet anyone dressed like this “ Lynn asked Tauriel who was following along but not walking next to Lynn .

‘I agree your attire is rather messy for the council to see you’ Lynn heard Tauriel thoughts briefly before she paused and said “ Not to worry Gandalf and the others wish to see you right away" . Lynn was surprised by this , knowing what her elf escort thought about her and knowing she was intentional brushing her off. Lynn had stopped and looked back at Tauriel , as she was about to turn and continue to the council chamber she could see in Tauriel’s expression she should turn around . Tauriel’s eyes opened widely and her mouth closed quickly she then went quickly down to her knee to kneel. As Lynn turned around she was then faced to face with ……..
111222211.title: They arrive at Rivendale with no attacks

choices: They continue to the council chamber
1112222112.content:
As the fair skinned Beautiful woman with blue eyes looked at Lynn with her gentle curls of blonde hair almost white flowed down her back . Lynn was stunned to see such a beautiful woman , in front of her and also that she made not a sound in her approach .

‘ You must be tired , and need refreshing please take your time and sleep .‘Galadriel’s blue eyes opened wide when she thought this .

Lynn was amazed that this elves’ woman didn’t need to say a word but just thought this to Lynn , as Lynn’s eye lids grew heavy she found her knees to give way as she fell back . “ Please take our guest to the ……..” Was all Lynn heard before she was in a deep sleep .

Waking to the smell first of jasmine flowers , and the smell of the most exotic perfumes she has ever smelled Lynn’s eyes opened to a blur of a white ceiling above her . As she blinked a few times she realized she needed her glasses , which she looked around and saw them on a table next to the bed she was laying on . As she grabbed her glass and slipped them on she was amazed to see what she was now wearing . Gone was her slicked back pony tail , her black hair was so naturally flowing it must have been brushed more than 50 times for it to flow with such easy . Lynn ran her fingers through it as was amazed , as she swung her legs over the side of the bed she was laying on with the nicest white blankets she has ever seen . The blankets and sheets felt like silk and just flowed over her body , and she placed her feet on the ground she noticed a pair of black boots that looked like the ones she has always wanted to buy from the store in the mall . With 3 kids she never had time or money for such amazing luxury items like the boots or the socks she was wearing . ‘Wow did I win the lottery and not know it ?’ Lynn thought as she slipped on the boots , and noticed that her Denim light blue jeans were gone as well . She was now wearing a tight pair of dark rock 47 jeans with the white stitching, and her brown warn belt that she had forever was also replaced with a new black leather belt double clasped . Her white shirt that was pretty much drown when she arrived at Rivendale was also replaced with a much heavier white fabric , and laced down to the mid section of her shirt which was now tucked in to her new jeans. As lynn found a reflective surface to look at herself in , she did a few twirls and admired her new wardrobe .

“ I hope everything is to your liking ?” A woman’s voice said from just behind Lynn , as Lynn spun around in shock to see Galadriel sitting in a white chair that was in the corner of the room .

“ Oh wow ….you startled me …..Yes everything is …..” Lynn started to say .

“ What your wildest dream would be ?” Galadriel finished what Lynn was about to say, as she came to her feet and smiled at Lynn .

“ Do not worry , I do not read others minds with out there knowledge of it .” She said to Lynn as she came closer and tied Lynn’s new lacey front shirt for her .

‘ But you can’t control yourself can you ?’ She thought to Lynn knowing Lynn could hear her thoughts .

“ How are you able to do that ?” Lynn asked not knowing if she was saying it out loud or thinking it .

“ There is much I know of you and what you can do ……would you like me to teach you more ?”
1112222112.title: Galadriel

choices: Sneaking out is harder then it sounds
11122221121.content:
As Lynn thought about her new companion in this lavishing room , something else was compelling her to ignore Galadriel and return to Gandalf and seek out the Lonely Mountain. Lynn Crossed her arms and thought for a moment about the choice she had presented to her, and just as she was about to say her choice .

‘If the Council figures out what you are , they will destroy you’ Galadriel Looked at Lynn with her piercing blue eyes .

Lynn dropped her arms to her side, and looked back at Galadriel raising her up on the left side as if she was a cocker spaniel curious about a sound she had just heard . As she adjusted her glasses, it was all too clear even without Galadriel in her head what Lynn was thinking at that moment.

“Why would they do that ? What do you mean?” Lynn asked frantically having this feeling she had about Gandalf being untrusting and the other elf woman was looking down on her as she entered the Keep.

“I can show you a way out of here , away from the Council’s eyes where they would not dare to follow. “ Galadriel said as she walked towards the doorway , just to the left of Lynn . As Lynn tracked her with her eyes and turned her head to not miss anything the elf was saying to her, and yet she felt in her gut that this was a better plan for some reason.

“But why would they want to destroy me?” Lynn continued to look puzzled , and confused . Not being a fool and blindly following Galadriel was the first notation that this human woman was not like the other maidens in Middle Earth. Galadriel looked back from the door way just spying over her left shoulder as her arms braced the door way opening, she didn’t want to show her smile of acceptance just yet.

“ They would find that you are not a random woman of the kingdom of man , but rather your very different…..Special” She said turning towards Lynn and clasping her hands together .

“ I am not special trust me I am so Ordinary . I work a very boring job , a very boring life , and I am -----“ As Lynn was going to continue her life story told from a lonely accountants point of view . Galadriel , interrupted ‘But you’re not ordinary at all , you have power that you have barely even tapped into. Power that I can show you how to use , how to master it’. Galadriel stared at Lynn as she approached reaching her hands out and placing them gently on Lynn’s upper arms.

“ All you have to do is trust that I will guide you wisely , and you will show everyone just how special you are.” She said as she leaned in and kissed Lynn on the forehead, it was not a normal exchange but Lynn closed her eyes and embraced it .

“ All right , I am in ……Can’t believe I am saying this …..but I am in what do we do ? Teach me Yoda.” Lynn said smiling at Galadriel , who smiled back at her .

“ First we have to get out of Rivendale , and make our way through the MerkyWoods”
11122221121.title: Lynn accepts Galadriel's offer

111222211212.content:
“We must move swiftly and with grace, as to not alert the Elves guarding the entrances of the City” Galadriel said as she surveyed the hall from which Lynn’s room was not guarded and most likely was Galadriel’s room when she visited Rivendale. Checking in either direction then reaching out and waving Lynn to follow her lead.

( In a Whisper) “Should we make for the horses?” Lynn asked as the pair strolled along the Balcony terrace. To the casual on looker it would appear as Galadriel was giving Lynn a tour of Rivendale, as they both strolled along.

‘We must be mindful; your voice can travel a great distance.’ Thinking a jester to Lynn as Galadriel peaked around the corner and down the stairwell.

It wasn’t the elves she was worried about but running into possibly Saruman the White , Gandalf or even Elrond. As they continued down a grand staircase, Galadriel felt the gaze of someone she did not want to attract and knew her plan was compromised.
